snippet: Britain's most decorated cyclist Bradley Wiggins announced his retirement on Wednesday after a stellar career during which he won most of the sport's biggest prizes....
lead_paragraph: Britain's most decorated cyclist Bradley Wiggins announced his retirement on Wednesday after a stellar career during which he won most of the sport's biggest prizes.

headline.main: Briton Wiggins Calls Time on Glittering Career
headline.print_headline: Briton Wiggins Calls Time on Glittering Career
